rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall welcoming visitors with a foyer that features Art Deco inspired decorative elements. Vastu aligned to the south-east to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with Art Deco fixtures and open layout. The design incorporates ample natural light through a window to the south-west for efficient ventilation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living room with intricate Art Deco patterns and central placement to ensure maximum light. The orientation is towards the east for natural morning light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space integrated with an adjoining kitchen. Features open seating and access to the central courtyard for fresh air.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with elegant Art Deco detailing and an en-suite bathroom. The room is oriented north for calm energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A master bedroom suite with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Designed in line with Vastu guidelines for prosperity, facing east.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A dedicated study space that offers a quiet environment and natural light from the south-facing window. Incorporates Art Deco decorative motifs.

openings.description: A grand entrance door with Art Deco detailing, enhancing the house's aesthetic while ensuring a welcoming entry.
Large windows in the living room and study to maximize natural light, following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
An open balcony adjacent to the living area that overlooks the central courtyard and garden, fostering ventilation and connection with nature.
